drivers.name: foo2qpdl
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

This is a driver developed for the Samsung CLP-300/310/315/320/325/360, CLP-600, CLP-610, CLP-620, CLX-2160 (printer only), CLX-3160 (printer only).

And the Xerox Phaser 6110 or Phaser 6110MFP (printer only).

PPD files (and the Foomatic XML files to generate them) come with the driver, therefore we do not supply PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.

notes:
The Samsung CLP-360 (USB) and Samsung CLP-365W (Net) are color laser printers with a 2012 street price of $230 USD.

This printer is supported by the foo2qpdl open software printer driver.

Consumables: Separate toner cartridges black (1500 prints, ~$54), yellow/magenta/cyan (1000 prints, ~$45 each), waste toner (5000 prints, ~$10), drum kit (24000 prints, ~$96)
